<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Finds the nearest common dominator of a set of BasicBlocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For every BB you add to the set, you can specify whether we &quot;remember&quot; the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// block.  When you get the common dominator, you can also ask whether it&#39;s one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of the blocks we remembered.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-structurizecfg-cpp-/nearestcommondominator"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-structurizecfg-cpp-/nearestcommondominator/#ab711ea58bf39e2fd1dd7755b51350844">NearestCommonDominator</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;DT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Result = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResultIsRemembered = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Add BB to the resulting dominator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> addBlock(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Remember) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Result) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result = BB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ResultIsRemembered = Remember;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NewResult = DT-&gt;findNearestCommonDominator(Result, BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NewResult != Result)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ResultIsRemembered = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NewResult == BB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ResultIsRemembered |= Remember;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Result = NewResult;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Transforms the control flow graph on one single entry/exit region</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// at a time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// After the transform all &quot;If&quot;/&quot;Then&quot;/&quot;Else&quot; style control flow looks like</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\verbatim</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// |/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ||   Where:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | |  1 = &quot;If&quot; block, calculates the condition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 4 |  2 = &quot;Then&quot; subregion, runs if the condition is true</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | /  3 = &quot;Flow&quot; blocks, newly inserted flow blocks, rejoins the flow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// |/   4 = &quot;Else&quot; optional subregion, runs if the condition is false</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 5    5 = &quot;End&quot; block, also rejoins the control flow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\endverbatim</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Control flow is expressed as a branch where the true exit goes into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &quot;Then&quot;/&quot;Else&quot; region, while the false exit skips the region</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The condition for the optional &quot;Else&quot; region is expressed as a PHI node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The incoming values of the PHI node are true for the &quot;If&quot; edge and false</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for the &quot;Then&quot; edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Additionally to that even complicated loops look like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\verbatim</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 ^  Where:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// | /  1 = &quot;Entry&quot; block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// |/   2 = &quot;Loop&quot; optional subregion, with all exits at &quot;Flow&quot; block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3    3 = &quot;Flow&quot; block, with back edge to entry block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\endverbatim</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The back edge of the &quot;Flow&quot; block is always on the false side of the branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// while the true side continues the general flow. So the loop condition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// consist of a network of PHI nodes where the true incoming values expresses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// breaks and the false values expresses continue states.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-structurizecfg-cpp-/structurizecfg"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-structurizecfg-cpp-/structurizecfg">StructurizeCFG</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Boolean;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Build up the general order of nodes, by performing a topological sort of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// parent region&#39;s nodes, while ensuring that there is no outer cycle node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// between any two inner cycle nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StructurizeCFG::orderNodes() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Order.resize(std::distance(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/graphtraits">GraphTraits&lt;Region &#42;&gt;::nodes&#95;begin</a>(ParentRegion),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/graphtraits">GraphTraits&lt;Region &#42;&gt;::nodes&#95;end</a>(ParentRegion)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Order.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldenseset">SmallDenseSet&lt;RegionNode &#42;&gt;</a> Nodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EntryNode = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-structurizecfg-cpp-/subgraphtraits/#a34895557d71e0559ff91d451eaf4025d">SubGraphTraits::getEntryNode</a>(ParentRegion);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A list of range indices of SCCs in Order, to be processed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector</a>&lt;std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt;, 8&gt; WorkList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = Order.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#a503c0214540e80733c0a0c53c067e6ee">while</a> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Run through all the SCCs in the subgraph starting with Entry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SCCI =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scc-iterator/#a430e6f48731308238761ee98c4d57eba">scc&#95;iterator&lt;SubGraphTraits::NodeRef, SubGraphTraits&gt;::begin</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 EntryNode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">         !SCCI.isAtEnd(); ++SCCI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;SCC = &#42;SCCI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An SCC up to the size of 2, can be reduced to an entry (the last node),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and a possible additional node. Therefore, it is already in order, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there is no need to add it to the work-list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = SCC.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">        WorkList.emplace&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the SCC nodes to the Order array.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// When we are reconstructing a PHI inside \\p PHIBlock with incoming values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// from predecessors \\p Incomings, we have a chance to mark the available value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// from some blocks as undefined. The function will find out all such blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and return in \\p UndefBlks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StructurizeCFG::findUndefBlocks(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PHIBlock, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> &amp;Incomings,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;UndefBlks)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  We may get a post-structured CFG like below:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  | P1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  F1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |\\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  //  | N</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  F2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |\\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  //  | P2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  F3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |\\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  //  B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// B is the block that has a PHI being reconstructed. P1/P2 are predecessors</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of B before structurization. F1/F2/F3 are flow blocks inserted during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// structurization process. Block N is not a predecessor of B before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// structurization, but are placed between the predecessors(P1/P2) of B after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// structurization. This usually means that threads went to N never take the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// path N-&gt;F2-&gt;F3-&gt;B. For example, the threads take the branch F1-&gt;N may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// always take the branch F2-&gt;P2. So, when we are reconstructing a PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// originally in B, we can safely say the incoming value from N is undefined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> VisitedBlock;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If two phi nodes have compatible incoming values (for each</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;BB, V&#93; : IncomingB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdater">SSAUpdater</a> Updater(&amp;InsertedPhis);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a>&gt; UndefBlksMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find phi nodes that have compatible incoming values (either they have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same value for the same block or only one phi node has an incoming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value, see example below). We only search again the phi&#39;s that are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// referenced by another phi, which is the case we care about.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example (-- means no incoming value):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// phi1 : BB1:phi2   BB2:v  BB3:--</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// phi2:  BB1:--     BB2:v  BB3:w</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then we can merge these incoming values and let phi1, phi2 use the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same set of incoming values:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// phi1&amp;phi2: BB1:phi2  BB2:v  BB3:w</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// By doing this, phi1 and phi2 would share more intermediate phi nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This would help reduce the number of phi nodes during SSA reconstruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and ultimately result in fewer COPY instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This should be correct, because if a phi node does not have incoming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value from certain block, this means the block is not the predecessor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the parent block, so we actually don&#39;t care about its incoming value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/equivalenceclasses">EquivalenceClasses&lt;PHINode &#42;&gt;</a> PhiClasses;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Explicitly refuse to treat regions as uniform if they have non-uniform</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subregions because those branches may have been removed and re-created,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so we look for our metadata instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Warning: It would be nice to treat regions as uniform based only on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// their direct child basic blocks&#39; terminators, regardless of whether</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subregions are uniform or not. However, this requires a very careful</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// look at SIAnnotateControlFlow to make sure nothing breaks there.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BB : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>-&gt;getNodeAs&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a>&gt;()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regionbase/#a10ba1eb8cf2fd3581b7929c2eac028b3">blocks</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Br = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(BB-&gt;getTerminator());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Br || !Br-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#a7e4be8b16fbd68c9045a388904044e01">isConditional</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Br-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a6c09737e146b2d816c911a047ac67ba4">getMetadata</a>(UniformMDKindID)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Early exit if we cannot have relaxed uniform regions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-structurizecfg-cpp-/#a9b06eabaad9c6987d1e42444487af880">RelaxedUniformRegions</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SubRegionsAreUniform = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Our region is uniform if:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 All conditional branches that are direct children are uniform (checked</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// above).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 And either:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   a. All sub-regions are uniform.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   b. There is one or less conditional branches among the direct children.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SubRegionsAreUniform || (ConditionalDirectChildren &lt;= 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"></CodeLine>
